data.description: A Perl framework for sending SMS messages
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
WWW::SMS has being developed since the last years by a growing
    community and it's being used in as core part in many Perl projects.
    Now I'm taking over the WWW::SMS as new mantainer and one of my main
    aims is to allow users to easily locate and use WWW::SMS,
    registering a namespace brings the project a bit close to this
    objective. Thanks.
